name: Tube rush
description:
This is a little game made for Trijam #48 themed Faster... FASTER... F-A-S-T-E-R. Conquer this endless runner by evading the red floor tiles. They shine light on the opposite side of where they are, so watch out for that!
The premise of this Game Jam is to create a game in three hours development time. The game design and publish phase is excluded from this time. I developed this prototype in 2 hours and 48 minutes. Because of that I didn't get to add all the features I wanted to this game.
I've included a download to the Unity project for anyone interested to  see how any of the games mechanics work.

Controlls: A/D or LEFT Arrow key/Right Arrow key to move

Objective: Try to get the highest score possible

Music: Moose by Bensound.com
